works.description: Watch aficionados have always liked the timepieces that have drawn inspiration from sources such as designer brands, as shown in our coverage for ‘Luxury watches inspired by classic cars‘ and adding further to the list is this special edition watch from Tudor, based on Ducati sports bikes. Based on the traditional red and black colors of Ducati, this time piece is meant to mark the partnership of the bike maker and the watch manufacturer, who will now be the official timekeeper of Ducati.
